TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It is similar but not identical to thalidomide. CC-1088 belongs to the family of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Es similar, pero no idéntico, a la talidomida. CC-1088 es un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis.
